attributes.title: GET THIS APP IF YOU WANT TO RUIN YOUR LIFE
attributes.review: Do not buy this app. Not only did it take 420 days to download,  but every time I open the app I was met with more and more terrifying things. The first time I opened the app all the birds in my area followed me everywhere I went for 3 weeks. When I closed it all of a sudden I realized that I had a permanent spray tan that would not come off. I tried opening the app to see if it would go away but then people around me started to yell that they missed their mommies. At this point I was absolutely horrified and didn’t know what to do so I closed the app. Let me tell you that if I could redo this I would. When I closed the app I immediately couldn’t see anyone’s clothes except for Trump’s merch and I have never seen so many naked people. On top of that, the app suddenly opened and took control of my phone so I couldn’t close it. Every time I tried to have a nice snack and eat some tide pods, I was teleported to a rally. I tried to make a tik tok but then I heard trump crying in my bathroom. Every time I got closer he kept yelling at me to take him to get a spray tan. While he was getting his tan, I tried to scrub mine off and every time I scrubbed, my hair got blonder and fluffier and my tan got oranger. DO NOT GET THIS APP unless you want to live in jumanji but worse.

attributes.title: unbelievably awful!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i wanted to support MY president, who is a good oompa loompa. the app took FOUR DAYS to download, for starters. second, when i opened it, i couldn’t even do anything without putting in my phone number, as if i’m not already subscribed to dump truck’s messaging system! so then i did as i was asked, AS EVERYONE SHOULD ALL THE TIME, but it told me my number was invalid?! then, like an hour later, my mom came in the door sobbing because she’d been calling me for 45 minutes and i wasn’t getting a SINGLE CALL! the app INVALIDATED MY PHONE NUMBER. turns out, my dad and sister are in the hospital because they were TRAMPLED by “black lives matter” (as if we don’t know... all lives matter!) protesters. they’re now in the hospital, and apparently have “coronavirus.” idk how, considering it’s a hoax, but like... go off i guess. so after i found this out, i get a notification FROM THE RUMP APP and it’s saying “thank you for your donation”?? so i checked my bank statements and it took 20,000 FROM MY ACCOUNT!! i didn’t get accepted into any of the colleges i applied to, but that was supposed to be my college money!! what am i supposed to do now??? i believe joke will fix it though!! he fixes everything, just look at the economy! (including this app, hopefully 😌)

attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️👄🧚‍♀️✨

He was raw he looked orange. 🧡I got frightened😰and closed the app immediately! 😣 I remember all the good things from my life before opening this app. Anyway your probably tired so let’s sing a song 🧚‍♀️✨tiktok there goes the mouse🐭 running 🏃 up⬆️the clock ⏰ the clock striked 1️⃣ the mouse 🐭 ran🏃down⬇️ hickory dickory dock✨🧚‍♀️ anyway I got side tracked bc carrot man tried to erase my memory but it didn’t work bc I just remembered all the horrible things he has done. attributes.title: AVOID AT ALL COST !!!!! 😡😫🤬
attributes.review: Avoid at all cost! This app will damage you! Beware of the probability of having your moral sanity ruined by this app! I was drawn in by the rave tweets of our “dear”, “non racist”, (“supposed”) elected leader that have done much more terrible, ugly wrongdoings than actually doing things that is right for the good of the most,  especially during the whole pandemic. As much as the president has failed us, this app was no different. It was such a letdown to be able to have such experience with this app. I was just sitting here minding my own business when I got notification that this whole app has took up half of my storage! Which prompted me to delete it as quickly as I decided to downloaded it. It is such a miracle that this app even exist while the free testing availability for Covid-19 for ALL states does not. It is interesting how this app is promoting the slogan “Keep America Great”, when in reality was it ever? Maybe before he was elected. Elections was meant to be an upgrade NOT a downgrade. Just like this app that needs a better one. Keep Away At All Cost from this app! Bless it with holy water 💧! Avoid it like a plague and WEAR A MASK 😷 for protection! If I could I would have given a much LOWER rating for this kind of app! 0/5 - A letdown, Keep Sanity Away from this App!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review:
This app is awful. A few days ago I was in the ally way by my local Walmart when I saw a caterpillar coming out of its cocoon. It was wonderful to see nature blossoming before your eyes! I was happily observing the caterpillar emerge when a notification for this app sounded. My phone started blowing up. Notification after notification rang as my flashlight flashed and the screen glowed in the dimly lit alleyway. Because of this monstrosity of an app the sound and flashing lights startled the caterpillar as he was blossoming out of his cocoon. Gregory was so startled it caused him to fall to a painful death on the hard concrete. I was devastated. Such an amazing thing in nature was completely ruined by the Trump administration‘s app. I did not even have my notifications on for the app. After this happened with tears running down my face I went into my settings to check if I had my notifications on. As I stated previously the notifications were not activated. This was the last straw. I began sobbing as I rushed to the corpse of the dead caterpillar. With my shaking hands I picked him up and gave him a proper burial in the flower bed outside the Walmart. This app killed the precious caterpillar Gregory. I CALL FOR JUSTICE 
#justiceforcaterpillars2020
#justiceforgregorythecaterpillar2020

SPREAD THE WORD ON TIKTOK, DUBSMASH, BYTE, etc.

attributes.title: This is horrible and bad and racist
attributes.review: I opened this up and what I saw was unbelievable I saw I saw I saw I saw I saw I saw I saw a FAT a GREASY Cheeto he had the essence of hitler I put my phone in the fridge like always so I can charge it but then when I came back my phone was in the freezer I looked back and I saw a bag of Cheetos behind my stove I looked behind my stove to eat the Cheetos but they tasted racist so then I went on a 4 day trip to Mexico I came back and everything in my fridge turned into orange popsicle’s so I called my mom and she said no that’s a waffle and I said no the waffle under the bed and she ran away then I turned around to a 7 foot burrito and I looked at my phone and it was 3 billion dollars and the Cheeto said he was gonna build a wall and make Mexico pay for it then my phone got a really bad virus (like the thousands of people who got THE virus cause the Cheeto is a self entitled p) and then my toaster turned into a banana and waffle cone of milk that day I was just getting back from my house and she was so disrespectful and I was just saying I wanna was a really bad joke she just wanna I was like she didn’t know how y’all dumb you know that I wanna is the day you get to go back and get your kids to go get jump in your car then go back up your car to get the cops 👮 I don’t p

attributes.title: v stinky 👹
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my goldfish and I broke into hives. We had to go to a veterinarian AND a doctor and I have to say neither of us appreciated it. I left my phone with this app open on the counter over night and when I woke up home my house looked like the forest house from Jumanji but instead of leaves it was Trump 2020 signs. I called an interior decorating company fix my house but when the workers came they recieved the bubonic plague. They ran out of the house boils and all and managed to run head first into a swarm of rats. The rats got infected and spread the disease all over my neighborhood. We had to go into extreme quarantine and the police covered it up as corona virus. While this was going on I went to check my Trump app to engage in the supportive community to lift my spirits. However it caused an earthquake that ate my house and yelled racist slurrs at me. I didn't understand because the whole reason I downloaded the app is because I'm white??? Anyway, I managed to escape but now I'm homeless and no one will shelter me in my plague infected community. I opened my Trunp app at this point for emotional support but the second it opened I got a call that my entire family fell into a sinkhole that spelled out the words MAGA and died. After these experiences I decided to delete the app.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD! TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: It took several weeks for the app to download. Once it did, it would not open for another week. I was able to finally open it, but after only a couple seconds on the app, my phone died. Permanently. I couldn’t turn my phone on after trying everything in the book. So I got a new phone and tried the app again. The same thing happened. I have now had to get two new phones because of this app. And that’s not even the worst of it. Since downloading the app the first time around, every single electronic in my house (tv, computer, etc.) has been glitching, shutting down and restarting every 8 minutes, and started to play What’s Up by 4 Non Blondes and Rockstar by Nickelback nonstop. I am in the process of purchasing all new electronics for my house. As well as issues with electronics, upon downloading the app the first time around, my dogs started to aggressively shout leftist propaganda at me. The second time I downloaded the app (on my new phone) my cats joined in. I had to hear leftist propaganda for weeks from all five of my pets. It wasn’t until I fed them my MAGA hats that they remained silent. Overall, this is a terrible app and I completely regret downloading it. In addition, the color scheme is horrendous and graphics are subpar.

attributes.title: You’ll be back.
attributes.review: You say the price of my love’s not a price that you’re willing to pay. You cry in your tea which you hurl in the sea when you see me go by. Why so sad. :( remember we made an arrangement when you went away now you’re making me mad. Remember despite our estrangement, I’m your man. You’ll be back soon you’ll see you’ll remember you belong to me you’ll be back time will tell you’ll remember that I served you well oceans rise empires fall we have seen each other through it all and when push comes to shove I will send a fully armed battalion to remind you of my love da da da da da da da da da diyada da da da da da diyada da da da da da da da da da diyada da da da da da. You say our love is draining and you can’t go on. You’ll be the one complaining when I am gone. And no don’t change the subject. Cuz you’re my favorite subject my sweet submissive subject my loyal royal subject forever and ever and ever and ever and ever. You’ll be back like before I will fight the fight and win the war for your love for your praise and I’ll love you till my dying days when you’re gone I’ll go mad so don’t throw away this thing we had cuz when push comes to shove i will kill your friends and family to remind you of my love da da da da da da da da da diyada da da da da diyada da da da da da da da da da diyada da da da da- everybody! Da da da da da da da da da diyada da da da da diyada da da da da daaaaaa diyada da da da da da diyadaaaaaaa.

attributes.title: this app = 🧚🏻✨life-long scarring✨🧚🏻
attributes.review:
Okay so... Storytime!! I was cutting my fish’s nails, and there was a campaign ad on the tv that was the all-knowing 🍊dissing on ✨biden✨.  All i could say was omg i need to know! does he have an app?! so i check the app store, and here this is! i installed it, but it took 3 hours to download, so i decided to clean my laundry with my toothbrush. after a while, the app downloaded. i opened it up, and it asked for my phone number. at first i was 👁👄👁, but then i was overcome with astonishment. the hot 🍊wants my number ! 🥰🥰 after a week of having it, it showed me the horrible things he has said, but i didn’t want to believe it, so i took time to think, and watched some nice tvd and damon salvatore , and i decided to open the app back up, and it showed me a pop-up of his “cheeto”. i immediately deleted the app, and i started having dreams of trump telling me to vote for him. like... sir, you scarred me! i will need therapy for years! also, kanye, you apparently love trump so much, just marry him! you and him will make a wonderful couple! i can picture it now ✨krump✨. All in all, this app will scar you, for life. don’t get it. 
p.s. wear masks... it’s the law. it’s not a choice, if you think it is, have fun with that kevin and karens! 😘😘 i’m just tryna ✨🧚🏻enjoy summer 2020✨
